class.reporter:label: Bib IDs by Holding Add/Delete Time (OCLC batch update)
Inter-system Copy Transit
class.oils_persist:source_definition: SELECT t.* FROM action.transit_copy t JOIN actor.org_unit AS s ON (t.source = s.id) JOIN actor.org_unit AS d ON (t.dest = d.id) WHERE s.parent_ou <> d.parent_ou

class.reporter:label: Open Circulation Billing by Owning Library
Open Circulation Balance by Owning Library
Open Circulation Billing by Circulating Library and Owning Library
Open Circulation Balance by Circulating Library and Owning Library
Open Circulation Billing by User Home Library and Owning Library
Open Circulation Balance by User Home Library and Owning Library
